Fishing Boston

When looking for some of the greatest sportfishing or bass fishing in Boston or just fishing New England, Boston Fish Tales is the charter fishing boat for you.

Sportfishing Charters - Boston, Massachusetts - New England - the best of Striped Bass Fishing and Deep Sea Tuna Fishing, charter fishing out of Crystal Cove Marina, Winthrop, MA.

Call NOW to reserve your private charter aboard---
